title: Kojika Monogatari (Story of a Fawn)
synopsis: Set in Hokkaido, Japan's outback, a young boy discovers a fawn whose mother has been hit by a car and attempts to raise it himself.
staff: [['Oosumi, Masaaki', ['Director']], ['Yamada, Etsuji', ['Sound Director']], ['Takanashi, Masaki', ['Theme Song Performance', ' Inserted Song Performance']], ['Sugiyama, Koichi', ['Music']]]
